caption: Relating to changing the eligibility of certain persons to receive community supervision, including deferred adjudication community supervision.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill modifies Texas criminal law to make illegal aliens ineligible for any form of community supervision, including deferred adjudication. Chinese immigrants who are in the US illegally or have failed to maintain their legal immigration status would be affected and cannot receive community supervision as an alternative to incarceration.

中文总结：
该法案修改德克萨斯州刑法，规定非法移民不能获得社区监督处分，包括暂缓判决的社区监督。对于非法入境或未能维持合法移民身份的中国移民，将无法获得社区监督作为监禁的替代方案。

Most likely committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Judiciary & Civil Jurisprudence Committee
